title: R-7 Expressway (Philippines)
text: The R-7 Expressway is a proposed expressway in <a href="Metro%20Manila">Metro Manila</a>, <a href="Philippines">Philippines</a> that will be partially elevated and partially underground expressway. Originally proposed in 1993, the project will be constructed over the most heavily congested corridors in Metro Manila, namely <a href="Quezon%20Avenue">Quezon Avenue</a> and <a href="Commonwealth%20Avenue%2C%20Quezon%20City">Commonwealth Avenue</a>. The expressway will be connecting <a href="Quezon%20City">Quezon City</a> and the City of <a href="Manila">Manila</a> with high speed transport facility, thus decongest traffic of at-grade road. It might be implemented in 2016–2018. The project is believed to cost PhP 23.980 billion (US$532.89 million).
